arts.ttl: It’s the Derby della Mole: Juventus vs. Torino
arts.sum: In the last 16 derbies at the bianconeri`s home, Juventus have always scored with a total of 36 goals; last goalless clash on 26 February 2008, 0-0 in Serie A. The official head-to-head record between the two sides at Juventus` home stands at 90 matches: 50 bianconeri wins (latest 2-0 in last year`s Serie A), 23 draws (latest 1-1 in Serie A 2021/22) and 17 granata victories (latest 1-2 in Serie A 1994/95).

arts.ttl: Juventus vs Torino – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Juventus are set to welcome their city rivals Torino to the Allianz Stadium this Saturday, aiming to continue their impressive unbeaten run in the Derby della Mole. Since Luciano Spalletti took the helm, Juventus kicked off his reign with a promising 2-1 victory on the road against Cremonese, showcasing his tactical influence and renewed energy […] The post Juventus vs Torino – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.sum: Torino take on Juventus at the Allianz Stadium in Matchday 11 of Serie A and the Granata are searching for a long-awaited win over the Bianconeri.
